amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to be used for the study of the Missouri River Projects authorized in section 108 of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2009.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for the study of the Missouri River Projects authorized in section 108 of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2009.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luetkemeyer amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 168 (Roll no. 323).
